ISSUE.TITLE: EncryptionService uses deprecated 3DES encryption
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 NIST urges all users of 3DES to migrate to AES as soon as possible. This recommendation was made in 2017. Resources - https://csrc.nist.gov/news/2017/update-to-current-use-and-deprecation-of-tdea - https://www.cryptomathic.com/news-events/blog/3des-is-officially-being-retired - https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/3des-deprecated-offically-being-retired-benjamin-budts/ P.S. We should ensure that all already encrypted resources will work fine after the change

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5896 Added support for the AES algorithm
